overview: Little American Maid is Mary and she has insatiable desires and craves sex every waking moment. She longs to please the master and his friends, as well as anyone who visits the house, in every possible way! Shot on 35mm film, you'll thrill to every beautifully photographed erotic scene, including Mary in the gym on her day off getting it on, with four horny studs! Featuring Lotus Blossom.
title: Little American Maid
